metadata.name: Terminus at Fenton's Green
metadata.description: Welcome to Victorian London. The year is 1888 and the city has never seen such peril. Danger is on every street corner and evil lurks in the hearts of every man, woman and child. Enter Theodore Paulsen, a well groomed gentleman and pillar of society. After receiving a strange invitation to the sleepy village of "Fenton's Green", he leaves the darkness of London behind and sets out on the journey which will change his life forever.
